study_tag.desc: Name of the Git branch or tag. If optuna job is executing, the study tag will be used for the optuna study name.

config_path.desc: Path (absolute or relative) to JSON config file for the experiment settings.

config_tag.desc: Textual tag attributing the config JSON file, to be used for the experiment output directory name.

cache_path.desc: Path (absolute or relative) to the cache directory.

output_path.desc: Path (absolute or relative) to the output directory.

dataset_path.desc: Path (absolute or relative) to the dataset directory.
